sources.title: Cataclysm (1980)
sources.description: Police detective, Mitchell, investigating the death of a victim of a Nazi concentration camp discovers a nightclubbing playboy who has strange powers over women and is seemingly ageless. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cataclysm-1980/

metadata.Plot: Police detective, Mitchell, investigating the death of a victim of a Nazi concentration camp discovers a nightclubbing playboy who has strange powers over women and is seemingly ageless.
metadata.Director: Phillip Marshak, Tom McGowan, Gregg G. Tallas
metadata.Actors: Cameron Mitchell, Marc Lawrence, Faith Clift
